#!/usr/bin/env ruby -w SUPPORT = ENV['TM_SUPPORT_PATH'] DIALOG = SUPPORT + '/bin/tm_dialog'
require "#{SUPPORT}/lib/osx/plist" require "#{SUPPORT}/lib/escape"
entities = [ ] File.read("#{ENV['TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT']}/entities.txt").scan(/^(\d+)\t(.+)$/) do |key, value| char = [key.to_i].pack('U') entities << { 'display' => "#{value} (#{char})", 'char' => char, 'entity' => value } end
plist = { 'entities' => entities, 'insertAsEntity' => true }.to_plist open("|#{e_sh DIALOG} -cm 'Insert Entity'", 'w+') do |io| io << plist; io.close_write
res = OSX::PropertyList.load(io.read)['result'] abort if res.nil?
if res['asEntity'] print '&' + res['returnArgument'].first['entity'] + ';' else print res['returnArgument'].first['char'] end end
